gnutellaClient

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnutellaClient.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PingMessage, PongMessage, QueryHitMessage, QueryMessage

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the structure of the header of a Message specified in the Gnutella Protocol v0.4
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ismael Fernandez, Miguel Vilchis
    See Also:
